home.introduction:
Hello! I am a front-end developer from Korea.
I enjoy contributing to open source as much as I have learned from it.
I'm interested in various fields such as backend, networking, and systems programming.
about.title: Using Technology for Creative Problem Solving
about.description:
I specialize in developing scalable and high-performance front-end projects, from small websites to large applications.
I mainly use Angular and React, but I prefer selecting the most efficient technology for the problem at hand.
I love giving back to open source and have worked on various projects.
about.contact_me: Need to get in touch? Send me an email at winetree94@gmail.com.
about.profile.description: I go by the nickname winetree94 online. Here are the platforms I am active on.
about.qualifications.description: I handle front-end projects from start to finish, optimizing technology stacks for different business environments, from on-premise to PaaS and SaaS.
about.qualifications.frontend.1: Design and development of Angular / React web applications (CRA/SSG/SSR)
about.qualifications.frontend.2: Project design and development based on ECMAScript / DOM API
about.qualifications.frontend.3: Development of module libraries using CommonJS / ES Module
about.qualifications.frontend.4: Operation of modern web bundlers like Webpack / Vite
about.qualifications.others.1: Deployment system setup and cost optimization for cloud platforms like Cloudflare / AWS / Azure
about.qualifications.others.2: Building and managing container deployment systems using Docker
about.experience.swit.title: Swit Korea
about.experience.swit.features.editor.de: Implemented a rich text editor supporting all Swit client platforms.
about.experience.swit.features.editor.ro: Developed the core editor based on ProseMirror
Implemented the editor for Android / iOS using WebView
about.experience.swit.features.auth.desc: Developed an integrated authentication solution for all Swit client platforms.
about.experience.swit.features.auth.roll: Synchronized authentication information across tabs using MessageChannel API
Implemented iframe embedding service to share sessions
about.experience.swit.features.design_sy: Developed the design system supporting all Swit web services.
Implemented components like Modal / Layer / Virtual Scroll
Set up automatic deployment system using Github Actions and NPM
Built an efficient translation system supporting 14 languages simultaneously.
Enhanced translation efficiency with ICU MessageFormat
Developed a back-office system for automating all data processes
about.experience.swit.features.task.desc: Renewed Swit's task management system and performed large-scale performance optimization.
about.experience.swit.features.task.roll: Implemented task lists and Kanban UI optimization
Developed a plugin for defining task states
about.experience.swit.activity.1: Lead development of cross-platform (Web, iOS, Android) text editor library
about.experience.swit.activity.2: Lead development of cross-platform (Web, iOS, Android) integrated authentication solution
about.experience.swit.activity.4: Built multi-language support system based on ICU MessageFormat
about.experience.swit.activity.5: Renewed and optimized the task management system
about.experience.epapyrus.title: ePapyrus
about.experience.epapyrus.features.pen.d: Implemented a feature allowing users to sign by hand on the web.
about.experience.epapyrus.features.pen.r: Developed the UI for pen input
Optimized vectors using linear interpolation and Bézier curves
about.experience.epapyrus.features.pki.d: Implemented a feature allowing users to digitally sign PDF documents using official certificates.
about.experience.epapyrus.features.pki.r: Developed the UI for digital signature form and process
Integrated official certificate modules from Korea Electronic Certification and Dream Security
about.experience.epapyrus.activity.1: Developed the digitizer pen input feature
about.experience.epapyrus.activity.2: Developed PKI/TSI certified digital signature service
about.experience.playauto.title: PlayAuto
about.experience.playauto.features.multi: Implemented a multi-framework architecture to gradually replace AngularJS after its end of life.
Implemented routing to switch between frameworks
Developed migration tools for framework replacement
about.experience.playauto.features.datat: Reimplemented the existing JQuery-based data table library to significantly improve page rendering performance.
Replaced all table libraries in the app
about.experience.playauto.features.pa_gl: Worked on full-stack development of the global shopping mall integration service.
Integrated APIs of overseas shopping malls like eBay, Shopee
Developed front-end UI for detailed pages at each sales stage
about.experience.playauto.activity.1: Developed the full-stack 'PA Global' shopping mall integration service
about.experience.playauto.activity.2: Developed a data table library for efficient rendering of large datasets
about.experience.playauto.activity.3: Integrated backends of multiple overseas shopping malls like eBay, Shopee, Lazada
about.experience.playauto.activity.4: Developed multi-framework architecture for technology replacement
about.experience.jdlab.title: JDLab
about.experience.jdlab.features.exim.des: Developed the Android app and backend for the online rehabilitation service 'Exim'.
about.experience.jdlab.features.exim.rol: Developed backend services based on Spring
Implemented Android app and video services
about.experience.jdlab.features.bupasa.d: Developed the web full-stack for the accessory sales shopping mall 'Bupasa'.
about.experience.jdlab.features.bupasa.r: Developed SPA service based on Vue 2
Developed backend services based on Spring
about.experience.jdlab.activity.1: Developed the 'Exim' rehabilitation service Android app and backend
about.experience.jdlab.activity.2: Developed the full-stack web service 'Bupasa' for accessory sales
about.open_source.edybara.title: Edybara
about.open_source.edybara.description: Creating a rich text editor library for browsers. This project aims to make it easy and fast to adopt ProseMirror in business.
about.open_source.edybara.features.1: Provides rich features and extensibility based on ProseMirror.
about.open_source.edybara.features.2: Monorepo distribution structure allows independent use of each feature.
about.open_source.edybara.features.3: Supports various formats and is easy for users to customize.
about.open_source.qdocs.title: Qdocs
about.open_source.qdocs.description: A tool for creating presentation slides with a focus on animation. I started this because existing presentation tools were inconvenient for my frequent presentations at work and external activities.
about.open_source.qdocs.features.1: Composes presentations in animation scenes rather than pages.
about.open_source.qdocs.features.2: Supports offline storage, making it usable in any environment where a browser is available.
about.open_source.vector_optimizer.title: Vector Optimizer
about.open_source.vector_optimizer.descr: A utility to make drawings on the web look more natural. Started to solve the problem of lines looking shaky when drawing with touch or pen.
about.open_source.vector_optimizer.featu: Optimizes user input coordinates to improve storage efficiency and rendering performance.
Uses the characteristics of Bézier curves to correct user input into smooth curves.
A library for fast rendering of large data sets using virtual scroll. I implemented this to overcome the problem of web being always slower than apps by adapting Android's RecyclerView for the web.
Renders only the elements at the scroll position seen by the user.
Reuses elements that are out of view to improve scroll performance.
projects.title: Just a few projects I have created or am working on.
projects.description: I mainly create projects to solve problems at work or in daily life.
